languages.text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-burst attack with a pistol, that attack pushes the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately reload it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical hit chance for pistol attacks.

Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack pushes the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

languages.text:
每当装备者使用手枪进行非{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击时，都会将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}2格。
如果装备者使用手枪击杀敌人，则会立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}。手枪每次重新装填，都会使手枪所有攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高5%。

Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者使用手枪进行非{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击时，都会将目标推开2格。
如果装备者使用手枪击杀敌人，则会立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}。手枪每次重新装填，都会使手枪所有攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高5%。

每当装备者使用手枪进行非{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击时，都会将目标推开2格。
如果装备者使用手枪击杀敌人，则会立刻{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}。手枪每次重新装填，都会使手枪所有攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高5%。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж стреляет из пистолета не {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, выстрел {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} цель на 2 клетки назад.
Убив противника выстрелом из пистолета, персонаж немедленно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} его. Каждая перезарядка пистолета на 5% увеличивает шанс критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} для атак из пистолета.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж стреляет из пистолета не очередью, выстрел отталкивает цель на 2 клетки назад.
Убив противника выстрелом из пистолета, персонаж немедленно перезаряжает его. Каждая перезарядка пистолета на 5% увеличивает шанс критического попадания для атак из пистолета.

Когда персонаж стреляет из пистолета не очередью, выстрел отталкивает цель на 2 клетки назад.
Убив противника выстрелом из пистолета, персонаж немедленно перезаряжает его. Каждая перезарядка пистолета на 5% увеличивает шанс критического попадания для атак из пистолета.

languages.text:
使用者がピストルを使って{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃以外を行うと、その攻撃で敵を2セル分突き飛ばす。
使用者がピストル攻撃を使って敵をキルすると、直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。ピストルのリロードのたびに、ピストル攻撃でのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}が5％上昇する。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack pushes the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
使用者がピストルを使って{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト{/g}攻撃以外を行うと、その攻撃で敵を2セル分突き飛ばす。
使用者がピストル攻撃を使って敵をキルすると、直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。ピストルのリロードのたびに、ピストル攻撃でのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が5％上昇する。

使用者がピストルを使って{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃以外を行うと、その攻撃で敵を2セル分突き飛ばす。
使用者がピストル攻撃を使って敵をキルすると、直ちに{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}する。ピストルのリロードのたびに、ピストル攻撃でのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット率{/g}が5％上昇する。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador realiza un ataque que no sea en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con una pistola, dicho ataque {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} al enemigo 2 casillas.
Si el portador elimina a un enemigo con un ataque con pistola, la {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} de inmediato. Con cada recarga de la pistola, obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico para los ataques con pistola.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador realiza un ataque que no sea en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g} con una pistola, dicho ataque empuja al enemigo 2 casillas.
Si el portador elimina a un enemigo con un ataque con pistola, la {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} de inmediato. Con cada recarga de la pistola, obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico para los ataques con pistola.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger einen Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriff{/g} mit einer Pistole ausführt, {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stößt{/g} der Angriff den Feind 2 Felder zurück.
Tötet der Träger einen Feind mit einer Pistole, wird diese sofort {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachgeladen{/g}. Jedes Nachladen einer Pistole gewährt +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für Pistolenangriffe.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündel{/g}angriff mit einer Pistole ausführt, stößt der Angriff den Feind um 2 Zellen zurück.
Tötet der Träger einen Feind mit einem Pistolenangriff, wird sie sofort {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachgeladen{/g}. Jedes Nachladen einer Pistole gewährt +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} für Pistolenangriffe.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur mène une attaque autre qu'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}en rafale{/g} à l'aide d'un pistolet, cette attaque {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} l'ennemi de 2 cases.
Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi avec un pistolet, ce dernier se {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement. Chaque recharge de pistolet confère +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique pour les attaques au pistolet.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer performs a non-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with a pistol, that attack {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the enemy by 2 cells.
If the wearer kills an enemy with a pistol attack, they immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} it. Each pistol reload grants +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for pistol attacks.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur mène une attaque autre qu'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g} à l'aide d'un pistolet, cette attaque repousse l'ennemi de 2 cases.
Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi en l'attaquant au pistolet, ce dernier se {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement. Chaque recharge de pistolet confère +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique pour les attaques au pistolet.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur mène une attaque autre qu'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g} à l'aide d'un pistolet, cette attaque repousse l'ennemi de 2 cases.
Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi en l'attaquant au pistolet, ce dernier se {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement. Chaque recharge de pistolet confère +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique pour les attaques au pistolet.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, tabancayla {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} dışında bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde o saldırı, düşmanı 2 hücre {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}.
Giyen kişi, tabanca saldırısıyla bir düşmanı öldürürse tabancayı anında {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}doldurur{/g}. Tabancanın her dolduruluşu, tabanca saldırılarına +%5 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazandırır.
